thread.section_title: Regina Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel - Review of Regina Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Silvianegrifirman
title: Beautiful hotel
text:
Despite my hundred trip to Paris, this was my first time at Regina Hotel. I usually book very last minute and it is not always easy to find availability.
The Hotel is beautiful and located in a strategic position.
When in Paris, you want to breath some grand style and a little bit of decadence and Regina offers you all of this together with great service.
Rooms are nice and spacious, staff is friendly and efficient and you can walk to most of the attractive places in town.
